attributes.action: Make police committees truly independant. Justice should be done & seen to be done.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It can not be right that Magistrates can be appointed to the Police Committees. Defence Solicitor's, Crown Prosecuter's etc. are not appointed. Its liken to game keeper's turned poacher's. It also begs the questian when these Magistrates sit in court are they indepenent or do they lean towards the Police. Its what the public perceive. It can not be politically correct.
